definition: Internet slang for 長知識|长知识[zhang3 zhi1 shi5]

sentences.english: None of these champions remotely resembles the long-side illustration.
sentences.chinese: 插图显示没有一个冠军使用类似长的身体姿势的姿势。

sentences.english: None of these champions remotely resembles the long-side illustration.
sentences.chinese: 插图显示没有一个冠军使用类似长的身体姿势的姿势。

sentences.english: Lower yourself into a half-sitting position above the toilet.
sentences.chinese: 以半坐的姿势蹲在便池上方。

sentences.english: Lo and behold, the boy sat in the cross - legged position , suspended in mid- air, without falling.
sentences.chinese: 孩子以双腿交叉坐着的姿势悬在空中，并没有掉下来。
梅金在椅子上换了个姿势。

sentences.english: Most singers are good at posing in front of cameras.
sentences.chinese: 大部份歌手都很擅长在镜头前摆姿势。

sentences.english: Inside, the cabin is well laid-out and the low driving position is good.
sentences.chinese: 驾驶舱布局合理，还有那绝好的低位驾驶姿势。

sentences.english: They know mores than the Kamasutra.
sentences.chinese: 他们想得到的姿势比印度爱经都多。

sentences.english: Your posture of reading and writing must be proper, or you will get spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 看书写字的姿势一定要端正，否则容易得脊椎病。

sentences.english: He holds the pen in a wrong way, so he cannot write well.
sentences.chinese: 他捉笔的姿势是错误的，不可能写出好看的字。

sentences.english: Catch the basketball behind the three-point line and square up to the basket in the triple threat position.
sentences.chinese: 持球站在三分线外，面向篮筐，摆好三重威胁姿势。

sentences.english: And also holding this kind of pen, just like that.
sentences.chinese: 握笔的姿势应该像这样。

sentences.english: Pose to pose involves defining the extremes and then filling in the spaces inbetween.
sentences.chinese: 姿势对应法是指先做出关键帧然后逐渐细化的方式。

sentences.english: His skis crossed and he sat down in a most undignified manner.
sentences.chinese: 交叉在一起坐下时，姿势很不雅观。

sentences.english: In the meantime, try changing positions and suing heat to relieve it.
sentences.chinese: 同时，试着改变姿势和诉诸热度来缓解它。

definition: variant of 姿勢|姿势[zi1 shi4]
a handstand/to turn upside down/to stand on one's head/upside down
